item.category: Information board identifying emergency contact company/number not displayed

item.title: Cycle lane not reinstated following line works, 27th August
item.description:
The junction of College Road with London road has recently had the lines repainted. There previously was a short section of dashed lines for a cycle lane which allowed cycles to access the advanced start box at the traffic lights, however this has not been reinstated during the recent works. Because of this, cars do not leave a gap to allow cycles to pass down the left hand side.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): College Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Traffic lights, 27th August
item.description:
Tesco colletts drive / traffic lights Filter turning red into tesco from Tewkesbury Road isn’t in sinc , taking along time to change . 0400 no traffic and having to wait for whole sequence to complete, wasn’t like this a couple of weeks ago , it changed automatically upon approaching lights
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Colletts Drive, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
